summary: Removes the \"Thump\" noise when you successfully create a Potion or Poison
descriptionHtml:
I own a 7.1 surround system with a subwoofer at my PC desk, so whenever I would create a Potion or Poison that \"thump\" part of the sound effect would shake my desk.

Well no longer, I silenced the thump sounds during Alchemy and thought I would upload it in case somebody else wanted to use it.   It\'s the exact same sound except with the \"thump\" part removed.

Installation
==========

1) Extract the .rar file
2) Copy the Data folder
3) Navigate to your main Skyrim folder and paste it there. Merge with existing data folder.


Other Sound Changing mods by myself and others
==========================================
